Comparison of the two images: The expert compared the two images tweeted by Swara Bhasker, highlighting the differences between them. They noted that photographs of B R Ambedkar and Bhagat Singh were replaced with images of Burhan Wani and Afzal Guru on the morphed image.
Analysis of the slogans: The expert examined the slogans present on both posters. They pointed out that the original poster had the slogan "Constitution Long Live Secularism Long Live," while the morphed image had the slogan "भारत तेरे टुकड़े होंगे इंशाअल्लाह इन्शाअल्लाह (India will be divided inshallah inshallah)."
Verification of the event details: The expert contacted Mayank Yadav, the co-founder of Samvidhan Bachao Sangharsh Samiti, and verified the details of the event mentioned on the poster. They confirmed that Arundhati Roy, Zeeshaan Ayyub, and Swara Bhasker were indeed scheduled to speak at the event.
Assessment of the actor: s statement: The expert took into account Swara Bhasker's tweet where she called the morphed image "fake" and highlighted how the original images and slogans were replaced. They considered her statement as additional evidence in verifying the authenticity of the claim.
